original_text: Joshua took all these royal cities and their kings and put them to the sword. He totally destroyed them, as Moses the servant of the Lord had commanded.
korean_text: 여호수아가 그 왕들의 모든 성읍과 그 모든 왕을 붙잡아 칼날로 쳐서 진멸하여 바쳤으니 여호와의 종 모세가 명령한 것과 같이 하였으되

sentences.original_text: Joshua took all these royal cities
and put them to the sword
as Moses the servant of the Lord had commanded
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 주의 종 모세가 명령한 대로였다
